info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ is an eco-friendly acrylic water-based primer used for concrete and drywall surfaces. This low-VOC formulation is designed to have superior alkali resistance, excellent adhesion and sealing properties ideal for interior and exterior application.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: Designed as an ideal primer for all water-based, low-VOC latex paint products including BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™, Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™, BOYSEN®® KNOxOUT™ Air Cleaning Paint B‑8701 Acrylic and B‑8702 Silicone. Used as primer on concrete, stucco, bricks, and drywall surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: New Concrete
info.body: Allow new concrete to dry for 14-28 days under normal weather conditions before painting. Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust, dirt, contaminants, and all loose grit and mortar. If neutralizing, treat surface with a solution of 1 part BOYSEN®® Masonry Neutralizer B‑44 diluted in 16 parts water, applying liberally by brush or roller. Let dry overnight before rinsing with water to remove white crystals that form on the surface. Let dry before painting. However, if the concrete has been cured for more than 28 days, there is no need for neutralizer.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Repainting
info.body: For repainting concrete with chalky old paint, use a surface conditioner. In case of mildew infestation, treat with a bleach solution (1:3, laundry bleach to water, respectively) by swabbing or brushing. To ensure proper treatment, let stand for 24 hours before cleaning off residue. Let dry.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Drywall Substrates
info.body: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendations.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ B‑105 Putty: BOYSEN®® Acrytex™ Cast B‑1711 (exterior) BOYSEN®® Masonry Putty B‑7311 (interior) 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ (interior) Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™ (interior) BOYSEN®® KNOxOUT™ Air Cleaning Paint B‑8701 Acrylic (interior) BOYSEN®® KNOxOUT™ Air Cleaning Paint B‑8702 Silicone (exterior)
